data.message: This is a beautiful thing you're doing 💜💜💜 thank you for spreading the love ☺

replies.message: Thanks for watching the video, Jona. We wanted to remind people about the power of giving back, and are doing so through this special greeting. Happy Giving Tuesday! -Rey

yes thank you for doing this, there are lots of homeless people out there and more everyday. my sister became homeless in october this year, her husband put her out after 33 years of marriage, because she was costing him money by her being at home all day and not working. she raised three boys that blame her for everthing in there lives that goes wrong, and they wouldnt even take her in. her husband wanted her to be on the street to teach her a lession. get a job and take care of yourself. but thanks to our mother she is not on the street, she is getting her teeth and health taken care of, learning everything is not her fault and that she is worth something. i am very proud of my sister. she has a great sprit, and is laughing and taking day by day. thanks for listening, i just wanted to let you know we apperaciate everything you are doing and hope more do the same.
What you are doing is Wonderful..We need more places like yours..Like Moses Lake...Thanks...
Can I work there? What your doing is so amazing! Makes me want to start one where I live!
God's Blessings be with you all my prays r with you.
We are looking for people who are interested in starting a similar page locally and you can email ty@facinghomelessness.org for more information.  Thank you!
